trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="LoadGrammarCompleted" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see langword="LoadGrammarCompleted" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` é criado quando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto gera seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> objeto gera seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The events are raised when calls to the `LoadGrammarAsync` methods complete.
trans-unit.target: Os eventos são gerados quando chamadas para o `LoadGrammarAsync` métodos concluir.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that was loaded, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto que foi carregado, o acesso a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> propriedade no manipulador para o evento.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor encontra uma exceção durante a operação, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> estiver definida como a exceção e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> propriedade associado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> pode ser `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um reconhecedor de fala compartilhado e, em seguida, cria dois tipos de gramáticas para reconhecer palavras específicas e aceitando ditado livre.

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo carrega assincronamente todas as gramáticas criadas para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: Handlers for the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events report the results of recognition and which grammar was used to perform the recognition.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores para o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> eventos relatam os resultados de reconhecimento e quais gramática foi usada para realizar o reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> object that has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> que concluiu o carregamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> that was loaded by the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> que foi carregado o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor encontra uma exceção durante a operação, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> estiver definida como a exceção e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> propriedade associado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> pode ser `false`.
